After selling the car to a new buyer, we realized the NOC was delayed. To resolve this, we conducted an in-depth investigation of the seller’s financial history, discovered the issue, and worked closely with the bank’s regional manager and head departments. Through persistent follow-ups and clear communication, we successfully resolved the issue, ensuring both the seller and buyer were satisfied without any trouble. This not only protected our clients but also reinforced their trust in our firm, demonstrating our commitment to customer satisfaction and problem-solving.
